=======
Contact
=======

------------
Get in touch
------------

If you have any problems or questions, please raise an issue on the `github page <https://github.com/pjamesjoyce/lcopt/>`_.

----------
Contribute
----------

If you want to contribute to Lcopt, please fork the `github repository <https://github.com/pjamesjoyce/lcopt/>`_ and open a pull request. Please accompany any new features with corresponding tests (written for `py.test <https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/index.html>`_).
